sourcing.instructions:

  2. Neodymium: Available from similar suppliers or online stores focusing on rare earth elements.  
  3. Silicon: Can be sourced from semiconductor material suppliers or chemical vendors.  
  4. Binder: Purchase from craft supply stores or online retailers specializing in adhesives.
